overview: The wife has bought a new TV and asks Evgeni to connect it to the cable net- work and fix it on the wall, so she can watch “Let’s Talk”. Evgeni finds online the phone number of a specialist for TV installation who comes with a delay of two hours. Evgeni first notices blood on his clothes and on his tools, and then recog- nizes in him the hero of a documentary film about serial murderers.
title: Akado
